website_summaries.verdict: An adjustable workout station so flexible you can base an entire circuit on just this one piece of equipment.
pros: A commercial-grade product originally designed for gyms
It folds down to just 8" high to allow easy storage
The 16 different configurations make this impressive workout station remarkably versatile
The resistance-tube channels are a clever innovation
cons: Some of the height was sacrificed for versatility, therefore it can feel a little low when used as a bench

customer_reviews.title: Only after a few uses...
customer_reviews.text: Although I love these benches, after only a few uses the one release broke right off. I did not see any place to contact the Seller regarding this item, so that is why I left the 1 star review. Maybe I just got 1 with issues, hope the other 3 I purchased lasts longer!
customer_reviews.author: Lilogirl

customer_reviews.title: Seat cracked... Awaiting seller response...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 6 months until the plastic on the seat cracked and the lock quit working. I used it as a home gym bench and it only ever saw normal use and minimal at that. Had it not cracked, I was completely satisfied. I have reached out to the company and I will amend this review if they contact me back and resolve my complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought it so I could do some dumbbell exercises in my room but decided not to use it. The surface is too hard you need a towel or two, so if you want to bench press or shoulder press it will not be very convenient. This is literally a step for other type of workouts that do not involve some heavy weights. If you are into aerobic exercises then it’s ok, but if you want some quick workouts that involve some heavier weights it’s not really optimal. Please do some research before you buy since paying 170 is pretty expensive while you can get a good weight lifting bed for way cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, solid make.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a few days so this isn't a review of the product after months of use. Product feels solid, it supports me (200lbs) plus two 55lb dumbbells. It remains in place and feels solid when using it for step-ups bearing 250 pounds. Looks good, too. It's not well cushioned for bench press BUT it's definitely tolerable. It feels roughly the same as a typical bench at the gym -- there aren't any hot spots or pokey sections. I'd give it a comfort rating of 4/5. Definitely worth the price, especially if you live in a small apartment as it is very compact.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Too small, only good for jumping jacks, not suitable for other excecises
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks cute and useful for jumping jacks. This is not at suitable for doing other workouts such as bench press, or other dumbell work out. For one this is way too small, I am 5'5" and this is small for me. The overall surface falls short when doing bench press. When doing hip thrust it must be put against a wall and it's not comfortable on shoulders when doing hip thrusts
customer_reviews.author: UbuntuUser

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I'm a personal trainer and when training ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I'm a personal trainer and when training outside or at a client's house, this thing is used for every workout! Very versatile and definitely durable too. I wish it was a little bit lighter weight since I travel daily from client to client, but everything else is great!
customer_reviews.author: Bethp

customer_reviews.title: ... at my studio but wanted to see if we liked this better
customer_reviews.text: I have the reebok step deck at my studio but wanted to see if we liked this better. So, if I were to compare, the only major difference is this one is easier on your back when you lay down. The reebok one has a ton at little bumps on it which can become uncomfortable. Otherwise the quality of both are great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas E. Glatzer

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great except the fact that using this bench for chest ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great except the fact that using this bench for chest workouts turns your back into a cheese grater. Back was all red and scratched up after a complete set of decline chest presses.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not for People Over About 5"2 in height.
customer_reviews.text: I think this Product is a great concept. I just don't understand why they did not make this Fitness Deck/Workout Bench about 10-12 inches longer. I am only 5"7 and it is nearly impossible for me to lay down on this bench and do Dumbbell Bench Presses without my head completely Floating/Not Supported. Additionally, if you are doing incline press, your head will also be Floating/Not Supported, unless you are 5"2 in height or under. If you are planning on using this fitness deck/workout bench for super lightweight or for step workouts, it does fold easily and should be fine for quick workouts.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Overall great, but when I put it at full height, it sometimes feels like the legs aren't fully locked, even though I pull them out until they snap. Handholds under the bench would have been nice for comfortable transport, as well as when I want to do core exercises like dragonflies and raises. Something like wheels to help it slide under a bed would have been helpful as well. Still, it does everything it's advertised to do. It's a reasonably inexpensive, versatile and lightweight alternative to a traditional weightlifting bench and having it has greatly enhanced my home workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Oshiro

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what i needed for my workouts. I chose this over the Reebok version because of complaints about the hard plastic bumps on Reebok’s... this one has rubber on top and is comfortable to lay on. Major upgrade from the kitchen step stool I was using to do my step-ups :-)
customer_reviews.author: thecapn

customer_reviews.title: Super versatile and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I do full body workouts on it. It takes minimal space but there's much you can do with it. It's very sturdy, yet light enough to move around. No assembly required and it's very easy to switch to different setups. The only thing I would like to see improved is the rubber padding on the surface. It's a bit hard so it's uncomfortable to do sit ups. Also, most of the surface is textured so it's uncomfortable for my knees when doing dumbbell one arm rows.
customer_reviews.author: pattyboy89

customer_reviews.title: Pretty goog bench
customer_reviews.text: Overall the bench is pretty good. Has storage for bands and different incline setting. A couple things to note: 1. It's not that confortable to lay on when doing press work....a towel helps. 2. Stability- when I do step ups I have to do them so the bench is long leaving me little room. If I do them normal with the becnh horizantal in front of me I can feel the bench jerl a little. I don't think it will come out from under me but not chancing it. I'm 5'8" about 170 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: P. Nutty

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bench. It helps me work out every area of my body, and I can stay home instead of driving 20 minutes to the gym. I really like the slots for my resistance bands and the adjustable back too. And it's not too heavy to pick up, but heavy enough to use without worry. Not so big it takes up a lot of room, but big enough for me to sit and lay down on for certain exercises. PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: M. Santoyo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Addition for Resistance Tube Workouts
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of added gear. I wouldn't call it super stable or sturdy but you also have to take into account that it is meant as a bench for resistance tubes and not heavy dumbells and such. Stores pretty easy. Pretty portable for travel although a little on the heavier side to be lugging it around a lot. But you can't have it be sturdy and light at the same time. So what you lack in light weight, you make up for in durability. All in all, a nice piece of equipment that is very versatile that can be used in the home. Nice color scheme as well.
customer_reviews.author: James Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: You need this!!
customer_reviews.text: Best bench/deck I could ask for! So many different ways to use it, it's easy to adjust to whatever I need it for. Love that it comes completely assembled, so pulled it right out of the box and put in my home gym and got started with Body Beast, and will continue using it when I begin Hammer & Chisel next month.
customer_reviews.author: BagProWA

customer_reviews.title: This is a great workout bench for those who lift weights and for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great workout bench for those who lift weights and for those who do programs that include stepping and jumping. It's sturdy and I can use some pretty heavy weights (2 30lbs) and still feel stable. The one star reduction is because it sometimes gets stuck changing the incline. And I've managed to snap my fingers shut when opening the step, but that is probably user error. It's also not the most comfortable on my back. But it helps motivate me to get done with those moves quicker. Its a great bench and super versatile for all different types of workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: perfect,  now get going!
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same step bench that is use at my gym. I actually wanted to purchase the same step bench from my gym and they wanted to charge me $300 😲 however I was able to come-on the website and find the exact bench. It is absolutely perfect if you want to work-out at home. You can find videos on YouTube to Workout to . It is very heavy so you will definitely have to use your muscles to pick it up. But it is well-worth it. I am 100% pleased and satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Swipingallday

customer_reviews.title: Best fitness bench ever!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted and more! Sturdy with more than one incline position and storage for small weights and bands. Portable so I can workout on my deck when weather permits and also doubles as a dog training tool. My Min-Pin loves to jump on and over, so you could say it's functional for all family members members.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Galvin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great portable bench! Excellent for benching, to step on for toe-ups with calves, folds away greatly! I'm 5'7 - It could be an inch or two longer, but I'm able to use it fine. Store bands on the inside storage and it's all I need for a workout if I don't want to use my dumbells. Pros: - Lightweight - Folds away nice - Sturdy material and well made - Storage Unit Cons: - Could be slightly longer
customer_reviews.author: Rohan Saxena

customer_reviews.title: Nice versatile workout bench for  home.
customer_reviews.text: I used something similar at Orangetheory. Love this little bench. Be aware that this best for average to small sized people. It sits lower to the ground than a standard bench and is made of plastic. I would be wary of anyone over 200 lbs doing box jumps on these benches. That being said, I do love it. This will help stay in somewhat good shape until I can go to class again.
customer_reviews.author: M. C.

customer_reviews.title: but I know there is something better for me
customer_reviews.text: Its very functional which is why I'll keep it, but its uncomfortable and when I do any chest exercises my head hangs off the edge. Well I hold it up, but its still awkward. I don't regret it, but I know there is something better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ben The Franklin

customer_reviews.title: All- In-One workout center
customer_reviews.text: This bench is quite comfortable and very sturdy. It is perfect for my small apartment. It is built with such good quality. I love the hidden compartment for my weights and jump rope. I also love the different recline levels as well. It is so convenient to have an all-in-one workout space right in the comfort of my own home. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after a suggestion of someone in a workout Facebook group, and I’m so glad I did! I wanted a bench of some sort, but liked the durability of steps more since I do a lot of stepping and jumping and was worried about damaging the seat leather on other benches. This is perfect for what I need and is so freaking handy! Very well thought out design. I have already recommended this to others and would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this deck and it works great for me. That being said, I am 5'4" and just fit it lying down. if you are taller, I would not recommend. The texture of the deck is a little rough to lie on but you can always put a workout towel down.
customer_reviews.author: JCGagne

customer_reviews.title: Love it stores so easily in my coat closit.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bench. It doesn’t slide. Love the versatility it lets me have in my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Rose

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: As good as it gets! This deck is excellent. Super sturdy. Grips the floor. Easy to use. Not to heavy. I’m quite certain I will never need another one. Quality is very high. Shipped quickly. Out of the box and ready to workout. If quality is important, buy this. I use a similar deck at my gym (Reebok) which is definitely good, but this Escape deck is better.
customer_reviews.author: N.A.

customer_reviews.title: Just Like My Bootcamp Studio's Bench
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this bench. I was familiar with this style from my bootcamp classes and wanted a similar model for my home setup. I use it for exercises like bench jumps, chest press, single leg squats, etc. and so far it holds up well. Very stable. Folding and unfolding the legs works pretty well but I will see how it holds up over time. Not much padding so use a towel if you are planning on doing chest press.
customer_reviews.author: BRITTANY D

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for all levels of fitness
customer_reviews.text: I saw these at Blink and thought if I had one at home I could do a lot with it and so I bought it. I love this and it’s very sturdy, you don’t have to worry about the step being unstable like the ones with risers. There is really so much to do with this and it also comes put together which is a huge plus. There is a lot you can do but it’s easy also to choose just 3 or 4 exercises to do 3 sets of and then when you get bored or that’s too easy there are plenty of variations.
customer_reviews.author: nalia Amz dont pay taxes

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This works great for a small home or apartment. It is compact and folds up nicely to get it out of the way between workouts. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Joe L.

customer_reviews.title: Check your measurements before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: If you are taller than 65-66 inches or have a big ASS, this is not for you!!! Great for stepping or sitting on the entire bench, BUT the small section to sit on when the back is raised is too narrow and too short to sit comfortably. Manufacturers could have made the bench a little wider and longer for maximum efficiency. I gave it 4-stars because I am able to work with it, especially as my weight continues to drop.
customer_reviews.author: Lanetta White

customer_reviews.title: Only for shorter people
customer_reviews.text: This bench doesn't work for 6' tall people, possibly even shorter. The bench is too short and doesn't provide neck/head support.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Shaw

customer_reviews.title: This bench is awesome with a capital "A" it comes fully assembled
customer_reviews.text: This bench is awesome with a capital "A" it comes fully assembled, sturdy, strong, and compact, my home gym is in a small area of my basement and this fits perfectly. I love the slots that are in the back for using my resistance bands, and the slot in the base in the front, if you want to one resistance band rows. Plus there is an app you can download onto your phone for work out suggestions. This is a great buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Mccusker

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to switch positions and makes an awesome adjustable ...
customer_reviews.text: No assembly required at all - comes out of the box ready to go! Super easy to switch positions and makes an awesome adjustable bench for flat, incline, and decline presses. Just a word of warning though: If you're above 5'7 (ish) and plan on using this as a flat bench for bench pressing, it might be too small for you - your head is going to hang over the edge. But if you're under 5'7 this makes an awesome bench/stepper combo!
customer_reviews.author: Abinator

customer_reviews.title: Good makeshift bench for small areas
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my needs. I am 5'8 and it barely let's me lay down from my spine/butt to to my head. If your any taller I dont think this will suit your needs. It's amazing in the sense that it's very versatile, light and can be put up in my small apartment
customer_reviews.author: Bilal Bukhari

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous workout bench. Love the portability and strength. I agree, if you are larger in height lying flat on this bench will be a challenge. I am 5'5 and am comfortable but I can imagine if you are taller than 5'8 - 5'9, or have a very long torso compared to legs, your lower back may hang too far off to be comfortable depending on the exercise you are doing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Clever design. Not functional.
customer_reviews.text: Like the width and sturdy composition of the bench. However too short in length to comfortably do any exercises without slipping off the end . Have used it as an expensive stepper, because it would be more trouble to return.
customer_reviews.author: usper

customer_reviews.title: Great workout bench for home gym!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend anyone who is getting into fitness and is building a home gym like myself to get one of these benches. It's adjustable height, raised variable inclined back, and storage make it worth the purchase and a great addition to your gym. Very sturdy and easy to put away if you only have a limited space.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great but a tiny bit short.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the versatility of this fitness deck. Great for step-ups and to use as a bench. Only downside is it’s a few inches closer to the ground than needed for sitting on. Hard to stand when doing one-leg sits due to its low height. Otherwise, it’s been great! Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ledoux

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bench
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench, is sturdy, adjustable and comfortable to sit and lay on. I’ve had it for 6 months and is in perfect shape, I use it 4 times a week to do cardio (steps) and weight training.
customer_reviews.author: Fern1

customer_reviews.title: Great multi function fitness bench !!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!! Has small storage inside bench for resistance tubes and is a multifunctional bench. It can be used for many muscle groups and step. Aslo, it folds for easy storage. Please note: If you are small to average size person it will be ideal for you. Do a product review. This plastic and can hold a certain amount of stress load!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great for dumbell bench pressing & seated bicep curls
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!.. max weight is 375lbs, & it feels to me like it could hold more weight easily. Im 5’9, but for people who are 6 ft tall or long torso, their heads will probably hang over the edge a bit, which might not be a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do any good....
customer_reviews.text: ....unless you use it. Got introduced to this when a member of a Senior's exercise program. Thought why pay the gym fee when you could do the same thing at home. Used it for maybe 2 weeks then got lazy.
customer_reviews.author: Opa S

customer_reviews.title: Must have home piece or travel trainer need!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those home workouts. I use a towel on some exercises since the top of the bench is not smooth. (But not a reason not to purchase) it’s compact for storing!! Main reason I bought! Love the adjustable features!!
customer_reviews.author: SocalMama3

customer_reviews.title: Well made- just a little short in length
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really well made. All the functions work well, everything is exactly what I was looking for... except the length. I’m about 5’7” and when lying on my back to do bench press w/dumbbells my head about falls off the end.. Really wish this was a little longer- or if there was a ‘Large’ size to order. Still happy with the purchase just not sure why they didn’t make the bench a little longer- first time in my life I felt tall ; )
customer_reviews.author: PBR1543

customer_reviews.title: Great All-around Bench
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy and multi-functional, haven't got the bands to go with it but is great on its own. the top is grippy so won't slide stepping on it and it is easy to open up and raise/lower. I feel comfortable recommending this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Student in NY

customer_reviews.title: My little work out area.
customer_reviews.text: So very happy that I purchased this product. Need to start using the app that shows ways to use the Escape. Doesn’t take up much room. Perfect if you want to have your own little work out area.
customer_reviews.author: tramell

customer_reviews.title: BOMB.COM
customer_reviews.text: Can i just say I love love this bench/step. Best buy to date. Especially for those of us who are challenged with getting on the floor to exercise. The rubber on the top and bottom makes it full slip proof. Not sure who came up with this but it was genius!!
customer_reviews.author: jolynn mumphrey-baskin

customer_reviews.title: Great Platform for a successful day...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product... Gives you many options for lifting, stretching, and stepping... You just have to be disciplined and follow through on your workout plan.
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great item to assist you in your workouts. Very compact. Nice when your limited on space
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of workout equipment
customer_reviews.text: Love this fitness deck. I'm 5'9" and it's great for me plus my toddler loves to play on it. I've been using it for step ups, box jumps and other Cardo moves rather than for heavy lifting. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Portable bench press/step thingy for fit truckers!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, rugged build, & how versatile it is! I'm a truck driver who wants to stay fit, so I got this. I can do just about everything I do in a normal gym with this thing. I highly recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Williams

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy and fully adjustable
customer_reviews.text: The BEST bench I have ever had!! It's strong and it's comfortable. It is fully adjustable: upright, incline, decline, and flat. It also acts as a step which is great for leg workouts. The price is hefty, but it is so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to our workout room. Kids (teens) wanted a traditional workout bench, and I wanted something more versatile. They were skeptical, but on board once it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E. Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of using it I like it. I have two issues that aren’t huge but a bit of a pain. The width and length could be a bit bigger. The second is the marks it leaves on you when you lay on it and get pressed down into it. Overall the quality is sturdy and it was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for a home gym
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a fathers day gift for my boyfriend and he loves this thing. He uses it everyday. He does pack up his gym equipment everyday and this doesn't take up much space. It fits in the closet and under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Esme Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: to short to sit on do do anything
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool bench but it's to short to sit on. Very uncomfortable I have to put my legs out to try to sit right. How do u expect someone to work out this way. This is like a kids bench to work out on
customer_reviews.author: joseph knowles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: We use these at my gym and they take a beating every day and hold up just great. I got one for a home gym and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: The Best Workout and Step Bench!
customer_reviews.text: I'm all about this bench!! I use it almost every day!! The ONLY issue I have is if I do forearm planks or anything on my forearms I would usually use a bench for, I can't, the treads hurt my arms. I haven't found a towel that stays in place, but since o can do all that on the ground anyway, I'm not concerned about it!! This does everything I need it to, is super lightweight and stores easily! It's also worked as extra seating when we've needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy and sturdy. Love that it can be used as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to do my Hanmer & Chisel and Body Pump workouts. It's heavy and sturdy. Love that it can be used as a step or bench. It is easy to use. I was worried it may be a little short but the height is ok. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Benna’ Kouri

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6 and this is the perfect size for me. If you are taller, you might have an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product bit expensive for what is and what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Chiquito

customer_reviews.title: workout
customer_reviews.text: Used one of these in a gym in TN loved it so bought one for my daughters workout room.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Great all-in-one home fitness equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I love this workout bench. I was looking for something to make my home fitness routine more effective, and this adjustable bench is awesome for following a wide range of home workout plans. A seriously valuable investment, and it comes totally assembled. It's lightweight, compact, and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great...perfect for what I was looking for... step bench and workout bench. Not the most comfortable workout bench, but for price and versatility is is right on point.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Great bench.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's pretty steardy and does not take up a lot of room. I am 6'2 282 and it holds me with no problem. It's a tad bit low when I'm doing seated exercises but I can live with it. I want to buy a 2nd because my wife lov s using it also for aerobics and plyometrics exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Versatile and sturdy. I work out at home and this is a great addition. I use it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Black

customer_reviews.title: This is probably one of the most useful workout item I have bought over the years
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the most useful workout item I have bought over the years. I'm using it for bodyboss program. The height is perfect and it doesn't move when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This Has Been Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I was needing. I have no complaints, height, width and overall size and comfort have worked out great. I have had and used it about one month, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Best/Workout Bench
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old son bought this with allowance money for home work outs between gym visits. Our gym has all new equipment and has the other big brand name version of this bench. This one is better! A lot better. The top is smooth so it's comfortable when laying on it. It adjusts easily, and was delivered VERY quickly.We are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Myosotis

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is awesome. Works just like at professional gyms. Love it and use it everyday
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Excellen
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy. Use it in many ways. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece. Only downside is ya need to lay ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Piece. Only downside is ya need to lay a towel down when ya start doing a lot of work on your back (its hard after all). Could be a little longer for us tall guys
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love all the variety workouts I can do with tho !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than other branded decks.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after using the reebok model during a few classes at my gym. This one is much more comfortable to lay on because the top is not ribbed. The smooth top also has markers for your feet that are very help full when doing step-up and box jump style exercises. If you are looking for a deck/bench, go with this model, the original Escape Fitness Deck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench
customer_reviews.text: Love this guys it’s awesome. It has been a great addition to my little home gym. I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: tim henderson

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but design could be better
customer_reviews.text: It does what I need, but it is quite difficult to get the legs out. The video showed how easy it is to get the legs out, but you kind of have to wrestle with it a bit to get the legs out. Also, be careful when lifting it because there have been many times where I accidentally grabbed the handle to open the compartment and not the handle to release the legs and the bench fell on my foot. I will keep using this as it's the only bench I have.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, aesthetic, and does it’s job if you ever get the gull to work out.
customer_reviews.text: Great deck and doesn’t take up a lot of space. Super sturdy and it’s nice to look at too.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Z.

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Lots of little features and adjustments make this fold-down bench really nice. Could be just a touch longer for 6' plus people.
customer_reviews.author: B. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout Bench
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is portable and very versatile and gave me the incentive to workout.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Zrodlo

customer_reviews.title: Great workout bench.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great workout bench. It's sturdy and definitely strong, but easy to move from room to room if you want to work out in different places in your house. I love it and use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Bug

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is convenient substitute for box jumps and I can use it for other movements if you don't have space. I don't like how expensive it is. If you have the funds it would our purchase a real bench.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Good for home gym
customer_reviews.text: a little rough on the back with the rubber padding but because you're also using it to step on it will last longer than a soft fabric that's not designed for stepping on. Can easily be solved by putting a towel or yoga pad behind you when your laying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cintron

customer_reviews.title: All you need for a complete workout!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because they have them at our local fitness center and they are just awesome. Very versatile - many ways to adjust seat and height plus attach bands. Can use for a complete workout.
customer_reviews.author: Syrinx

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It’s good in some ways but it’s uncomfortable for certain exercises like crunches, hip thrusts, kneel or to sit on. Just wasn’t right for me I am going to buy a regular exercise bench with cushion.
customer_reviews.author: denise vargas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, pretty heavy so that it doesnt move around ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, pretty heavy so that it doesnt move around when you’re working out. Love the little storage soace for my resistance bands. There are so many exercises you can do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette D.

customer_reviews.title: Not totally sturdy and it gets stuck when putting the back of ...
customer_reviews.text: Not totally sturdy and it gets stuck when putting the back of the bench from the top settling back down. However it does everything we need it do
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bench..works for mutiple things . The only thing I don't like is its hard on the back with the groves in it. I have to lay a towel over it so it isn't so uncomfortable . Other than that it's sturdy and convenient ,also takes up very little space.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to a standard bench for someone with less ...
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to a standard bench for someone with less space for equipment. Sturdy design that folds down for easy storage when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Item delivered as expected. Would buy from seller again! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! Just what I needed for the days when I don’t go to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: KBrownie

customer_reviews.title: It holds up to whatever you throw at it
customer_reviews.text: I put this thru tough workouts!!! It holds up. Step ups and benches and a little storage in it too

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Exercise Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile, can vary positions almost efforlessly, and very easy to store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos M. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I so love this bench, it is very user friendly, well made and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and easy to use bench. I love how sturdy it is. I wanted it a bit higher for step ups, so I put yoga blocks under each end to raisbit 4 more inches and that works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: RaVo

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Bench is even better in person than I could have imagined. Quality build and sturdy. Was able to go from dumbbell fly right to cable press quick and efficient. Super impressed with this addition to the ever growing home gym. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Professional-quality
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed - the same as the professional quality benches in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Miracles

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the ways I can use this bench! It’s a great place to store my resistance bands and other smaller workout equipment!
customer_reviews.author: AHutchens

customer_reviews.title: Great step and bench!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but had to share how much I'm enjoying this bench. It handles all the functions of a step and a bench. I love multi-use products! This is well made and very efficient. Exactly what I was looking for in one piece of equipment. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Schweeeet!
customer_reviews.text: I sure waited a long time for these benches to come back down to a reasonable price. When it did, I went for it. Used it for a while now, for "flys" only, and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: SSG

product_meta.title: Escape Fitness Multi Purpose Fitness Station Deck for Step, Weight Training, Bootcamps, and More in Black
product_meta.description:
A portable training system that works as an aerobic step, plyometric platform and adjustable strength-training bench. Deck 2.0 lets you create your own step, circuit and whole body routines with a tool proven in BODYPUMP™, boot camps and Group X classes worldwide.
As a step, it has two different heights. Low Step setting (20.5cm /8 inches) minimizes joint impact. High Step setting (35.5cm /14 inches) ups the challenge for plyometrics.
Lift the adjustable backrest for a weight bench. Choose between 30°, 45° and 70° angles. The steel tubing supported backrest gives extra strength for confidence.
In Step and Bench modes, it can go into an incline/decline Ramp for added versatility. Deck 2.0 has 16 different configurations. Plus open the backrest for training tools storage. It also has resistance tube channels for tube exercises.
feature_bullets: TOTAL BODY WORKOUT: Versatile design with total body strength and cardio home workouts for fitness pros and novices, men/women
ALL IN 1 MACHINE: Equipped with 16 configurations all in 1 with weight bench, stepping platform, plyometric box, resistance tubes, and more
FEATURES BUILT-IN STORAGE: Lift backrest for an integrated storage bin to easily and quickly access equipment
CHOOSE YOUR ANGLE: Features adjustable backrest with steel tubing support and 3 different angles (30, 45, and 70 degrees) for weight bench
CHALLENGE YOURSELF: Switch between an incline or decline ramp while in step and bench modes for a challenge
